general_programs_except_bpharm.ssc_hsc: Minimum GPA 3.00 in both SSC and HSC.
general_programs_except_bpharm.diploma: Minimum GPA 2.40 in Diploma in Engineering under Bangladesh Technical Education Board.

o_a_levels.requirement: Passed GCE O Level in at least 5 subjects and A Level in at least 2 subjects.
o_a_levels.condition: Best 5 O Level + best 2 A Level subjects considered. At least 4 subjects must have GPA 4.0 (grade B) and remaining 3 subjects GPA 3.5 (grade C).

general_programs_except_bpharm.freedom_fighter_quota: Total GPA 5.00 in both SSC and HSC for children of Freedom Fighters.

subject_requirements.cse: Mathematics & Physics in HSC or A Level
subject_requirements.ice: Mathematics & Physics in HSC or A Level
subject_requirements.eee: Mathematics & Physics in HSC or A Level
subject_requirements.geb: Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Mathematics in HSC or equivalent; Biology in SSC
subject_requirements.civil: Mathematics, Chemistry & Physics in HSC or A Level

bpharm.citizenship: Must be Bangladeshi citizen (foreign students only via Govt. allocated seats).

ssc_hsc.minimum_each: Not less than GPA 3.50 in any examination.

bpharm.special_note: If student did not take Mathematics in HSC/A Level, they must complete an extra 3-credit Math course.
bpharm.year_of_pass: HSC or equivalent must be passed in 2023 or 2024.

foreign_students.equivalency: Certificate required from Pharmacy Council of Bangladesh (PCB).

assessment.oral_test: May also be taken for further assessment.

bpharm.pcb_requirement: New students must complete online pre-registration with PCB within first 3 months of first semester.

sat_waiver.requirement: Minimum total SAT score of 1500 (Critical Reading, Math, Writing).
sat_waiver.science_engineering_additional: Min GPA 3.5 in Math and Physics separately in HSC/A Level.

foreign_students.sat: SAT score 1100 OR upper 50% marks/grade in their education system.
foreign_students.assessment: Equivalence committee will assess eligibility and may recommend scholarships/financial aid.

mba_emba.degree: Successful completion of at least a Bachelor degree from a reputed University.
mba_emba.ssc_hsc_gpa: Minimum GPA 2.50 in both SSC and HSC.

o_a_levels.requirement: Passed O Level in at least 5 subjects and A Level in at least 2 subjects.
o_a_levels.condition: At least 4B's (GPA 4.0) and 3C's (GPA 3.5) among the 7 subjects.

emba.work_experience: Minimum 2 years after graduation in executive position.

test_exemptions.ewu_graduates: UG CGPA ≥ 3.00 exempt from written admission test.
test_exemptions.other_universities: CGPA ≥ 3.50 exempt from written admission test.

required_documents: Original and photocopies of all academic certificates
Original and photocopies of all mark sheets/transcripts
